name: Aditi
greetingText: Happy 20th birthday, Love!!!As you embark on this new chapter of your life, I hope you feel surrounded by love and positivity. I wish for you a year filled with endless opportunities and experiences that will create memories to last a lifetime. I hope this birthday is just the start of a year as amazing as you are.!
wishText: I hope today is filled with all your favorite things, surrounded by the people who love and care about you. And even though I can't be there to celebrate with you in person, know that my thoughts and love are with you always.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! And I love you , so I decided to write another long message...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something NOT-SO Typical engineer types and something special
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if how much you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
